issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h5.Description

The SDK version being built with is logged for both iOS and Android, it would be nice to also log this for Windows Platform, currently it can inferred from some related logging but having it explicitly logged would be better.

Android logs {{Targeting Android SDK API: 23}} and iOS logs {{Building using iOS SDK: 9.3}} for example.
fields.summary: Windows: Log the Windows SDK version being built with
fields.environment:
Windows 10 Pro
Visual Studio 2015 Community Update 2
Appc Core: 5.3.0-43
Appc NPM: 4.2.5-5
Ti SDK: 5.3.0.v20160512105713

comments.body:
Verified, the console now logs the following information:
{{[INFO] :   Targeting Windows SDK: 10.0}}

*Environment* 
{code:java}
Device: Lumia 640 LTE
Operating System
  Name                        = Microsoft Windows 10 Pro
  Version                     = 10.0.14393
  Architecture                = 64bit
  # CPUs                      = 4
  Memory                      = 17034395648
 
Node.js
  Node.js Version             = 4.4.4
  npm Version                 = 2.11.3
 
Titanium CLI
  CLI Version                 = 5.0.10
 
Titanium SDK
  SDK Version                 = 6.1.0.v20161202124434
  Target Platform             = windows
{code}
